description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
All Changes

Enhancements

EMAILNET-38546 - List only completed tasks from Exchange server
EMAILNET-38453 - EWS: Retrieve Extended Properties for Items
EMAILNET-38533 - Filter mail messages by date and time when using EWS
EMAILNET-38550 - Filter mail messages by date and time when using Imap

Bugs

EMAILNET-38523 - EML to MHTML: Output text size is different
EMAILNET-38526 - Regression: EML to MSG doesn't load images in Output
EMAILNET-38529 - SmtpClient leaking ThreadLocal data
EMAILNET-38531 - Subject is getting corrupted after changing its encoding
EMAILNET-38537 - One-Off Distribution List added to PST can't be opened in MS Outlook
EMAILNET-38538 - MSG to VCF doesn't care about the line breaks in Notes
EMAILNET-38539 - EML to EML garbles message body
EMAILNET-38541 - When email attachments are saved to disk, the .msg files get corrupted
EMAILNET-38542 - PST generated with Calendar Items crashes Outlook 2010
EMAILNET-38544 - Pst created with sample MSGs crashes Outlook
EMAILNET-38548 - Applying license to this EML removes the message signature
EMAILNET-38549 - Multiple To entries in EML are not read by MailMessage
EMAILNET-38509 - EML to TIFF raises exception
EMAILNET-38512 - ImapClient.ListMessages(MailQuery, int) raises System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException for unread messages
EMAILNET-38532 - PersonalStorage.SplitInto raises exception when License is not applied
EMAILNET-38540 - IEWSClient.ListMessages causes exceptions when some fields of email message headers have big length
EMAILNET-38543 - Exception when replying to MSG with attachments
EMAILNET-38547 - System.OutOfMemoryException while loading mail object to MapiMessage
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
